page.title: 18MY HOBBY - HORSE RIDING 2
page.content: STUBBORNNESS IS THE PROBLEM I HAD TO OVERCOME WITH EBONY, WHO IS ABOUT THE NAUGHTIEST PONY WHO EVER SET FOOT IN ENGLAND. I USED TO HAVE TO BE ONE STEP AHEAD OF HER ALL THE TIME, BUT WITH PATIENCE, FIRMNESS AND CONFIDENCE, I MANAGED.NOW SHE IS AS GOOD AS GOLD AND IS ONE OF THE MOST IMPORTANT FEATURES OF MY HOME LIFE. DURING SCHOOL TIME IT IS DIFFICULT TO HAVE A GOOD LONG RIDE AS I LEAVE FOR SCHOOL AT 8AM AND GET BACK HOME AT 5PM., SO I JUST GO FOR A I5-2O MINUTE RIDE TO KEEP HER TICKING OVER, AND HAVE A I-2 HOUR RIDE AT THE WEEKENDS. AS YOU MIGHT HAVE GATHERED, OWNING A HORSE OR PONY IS A LUXURY AND SHOULD BE GIVEN ONLY TO THOSE WHO DESERVE IT, AND WHO LOOK AFTER THEIR MOUNT.
